acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should throw an exception if the @PodamFloatValue annotation contains invalid characters
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldThrowExceptionWhenPodamFloatValueContainsInvalidCharacters

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.FloatValueWithErrorPojo
test-step.error: The annotation value: fafhakljhf could not be converted to a Float. An exception will be thrown.
test-step.exception: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:The annotation value: fafhakljhf could not be converted to a Float. An exception will be thrown. [uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.getFloatValueWithinRange(PodamFactoryImpl.java:821), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.resolveBoxedValue(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1007), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufactureAttributeValue(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1557), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.populatePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1395), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1244), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojo(PodamFactoryImpl.java:175), uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.steps.PodamInvocationSteps.whenIInvokeTheFactoryForClass(PodamInvocationSteps.java:13), uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.features.annotations.AnnotationsTest.podamShouldThrowExceptionWhenPodamFloatValueContainsInvalidCharacters(AnnotationsTest.java:539)]
